sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical features and treatment of traumatic cerebral intraventricular hemorrhage(TIVH).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨外伤性脑室出血的临床特点和治疗方法。

sentences.english: To investigate clinical feature and therapeutic approach of traumatic dural sinus.
sentences.chinese: 探讨外伤性颅内静脉窦损伤的临床特点及治疗。

sentences.english: A dead body revenges not injuries.
sentences.chinese: 只有尸体才不会为受到的外伤而报复。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the prognostic risk factors of traumatic basal ganglia hematoma (TBGH).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨影响外伤性基底节血肿预后的相关因素。

sentences.english: After nerve injury, the nerve function can be compensated by axonal plasticity .
sentences.chinese: 脑外伤后神经损伤可通过轴突的可塑性来代偿其功能。

sentences.english: Objective To observe children ocular injury vitrectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价儿童眼外伤玻璃体切除术。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the clinical features and surgical outcome of the traumatic hematomas posterior cranial fossa .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨外伤性后颅窝血肿的临床特征和手术疗效。

sentences.english: Have you ever been unconscious from an injury?
sentences.chinese: 你有过外伤所致的意识丧失吗？

sentences.english: Stop any bleeding injury by applying direct pressure to the wound.
sentences.chinese: 如有流血的外伤，立即直接压迫伤处止血。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical curative effect of segmental arch technique in incisor luxation.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价片段弓矫治技术治疗前牙外伤的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the pathogenesis of atelectasis after chest trauma.
sentences.chinese: 目的对胸外伤后肺不张发生的原因进行探讨。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the therapeutic method of traumatic hyphema.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨外伤性前房积血的治疗方法。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the treatment of the open trauma of the auricle of pinna.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结颈部开放性外伤临床救治经验。

sentences.english: Fortunately, all his injuries resulting from the car accident are external.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，他在那起车祸中所受的都是皮外伤。

sentences.english: All facilities had limited ability to perform basic trauma and general surgical procedures.
sentences.chinese: 所有机构进行基本外伤和一般外科处置的能力均有限。

sentences.english: To investigate the causes of the rebleeding after the operation of major hepatic trauma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨严重肝外伤术后再出血的原因。

definition: to abrade/to scrape/to chafe/to graze/abrasion/friction burn/scratch
to suffer a fracture/(of a bone) to break/fracture
hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
to recover completely (from illness or injury)
